Question
========
An object is moving in a circle with a constant speed. Its acceleration is

Answerlist
----------
* directed towards the centre of the circle.
* tangent to the circle.
* directed away from the centre of the circle.
* in the same direction as its velocity.
* opposite the direction of its velocity.
* zero.

Solution
========
An object in uniform circular motion has a centripetal acceleration that always
points toward the centre of the circle.
